org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.session

Interface BatchExecutionAssistant<R,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - type of the result returned from batch operation.
    V - type of the value used in batch operation.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericBatchExecutionAssistant

    public interface BatchExecutionAssistant<R,V>
    Provides information for batch operations (loadAll, deleteAll, writeAll) of Ignite cache backed by CassandraCacheStore.

    • Method Summary
